title: Having a problem attaching an Excel file; when I restarted it, saved message was not visible in drafts
content:
I had written a fairly long message, and tried to attach an Excel spreadsheet. I usually have a problem finding a MS file - seems to have a number of "documents" folder locations. Assume some are "copy of" folders. So every copy I could find of the *file* gave an error of "File name" "Not implemented". I thought at first it was a pseudo-folder issue, why I tried all of them.

One of the suggestions I read was to log out and back in to TBird. I x'd out of it, and said yes to save as draft. When I logged back in, the Drafts folder was empty. I did a search all on my account, and found it, with the folder listed as Drafts. But I still couldn't get the Excel to attach (I finally solved it by using Outlook. Not my favorite option, but it seems to have worked.

I went back to Drafts after sending with Outlook, and I'm not sure what happened, but it was no longer showing in the Drafts, and then I did something else, and it showed up in Drafts. No, not sure what I did.

Anyone have any ideas? TBird: 128.7.1esr (64-bit) Microsoft® Excel® for Microsoft 365 MSO (Version 2502 Build 16.0.18526.20086) 64-bit
creator: diana32

title: Вячеслав

При просмотре сообщения в отдельном окне - открывается пустое окно - "Скриншот 2" прилагается. Все новые поступающие сообщения и сообщения которые были прочитаны открываются и просматриваются нормально.

title: Display actual incoming name and email in the From field
content:
The background is that I am using a contact form from my website. The From field on the contact form contains the name of the person sending the form, John Doe say (information I require), plus my own email as the sender (technically essential.)

However when I get an incoming email, in the From field in TB recognises the name in the email as being me. Then instead of showing John Doe as the From name, it shows my own name plus the little round head-and-shoulders icon. Well, I know my own name, what I need to see is John Doe's name. But no amount of clicking on the icon will show me John Doe.

[Yes! There ARE other ways of getting the name from the contact form! They don't help and this question is about TB, not the contact form. I need to have it like this for reasons to do with searching for emails inside TB.]

However, if I search "From contains <John Doe>" then the email correctly comes up, proving that the sender's name does arrive, it just doesn't get displayed.

The best solution would be if can completely get rid of the feature where TB shows the name and the icon, and revert to how things used to be where it showed the email and name directly, no icon. Can this be done?

Many thanks.
creator: Andrew3142

title: Thunderbird no longer connects to all my e-mail servers if NordVPN is enabled
content: Hi, I am running, on a Windows 10 laptop, Thunderbird 128.7.1esr (64-bit), which seems to be the latest version. If NordVPN (with all the Threat protections PRO options turned off) is on, and any server is chosen onto NordVPN, Thunderbird is no longer able to connect and download any message. I knew there were some issues if the NordVPN threat protections were on, but now I just cannot use Thunderbird anymore if NordVPN is on. I have about 20+ email addresses with different domain names, on different servers, and the connection problems occur with all of them. This does not happen if I run NordVPN on my android phone with another e-mail client, so I am starting to think that, for some reasons, Thunderbird and NordVPN have developed some sort of incompatibility.

title: Failed to find the settings for your email account
content:
locked as duplicate of /questions/1496958 in Thunderbird section even though this thread could have been moved

I checked the settings multiple times. The settings you see in the screenshot are correct. These are the settings I've used for the past 10 years. No problems until now. I just logged in today and Thunderbird did not want to work. K-9 Mail works just fine on all my Android devices. This is happening only on Thunderbird desktop.

• To troubleshoot the problem, I first removed the account and added it back. That did not work. • Next, I uninstalled Thunderbird and installed it back. Same problem persists. • This time I uninstalled Thunderbird using Geek Uninstaller to remove all related cache. Install Thunderbird back and try again. Did not work. • Read A2Hosting article a bunch of times: https://www.a2hosting.com/kb/getting-started-guide/setting-up-e-mail/accessing-e-mail-accounts-with-client-applications. Confirmed, all my settings are correct. Thunderbird is still not working.
creator: arcorian

title: berichten (conversaties) samenvoegen uitschakelen kan niet volgens handleiding
content:
Ik zag dat iemand al eerder hetzelfde probleem heeft aangegeven bij jullie. Maar een echte oplossing werd helaas niet geboden. Dus ik probeer het opnieuw.

In 2024 stelde iemand jullie dezelfde vraag als die ik heb: Ik wil dat berichten niet als conversaties worden weergegeven maar in volgorde van binnenkomst in de inkomende postbus verschijnt. Kan niet vinden hoe dat moet.

Moderator stuurde een linkje naar een helpartikel (moderator: ik denk dat dit artikel uw vraag beantwoordt) maar die klopt niet.

(klant 2024: Als ik conform het artikel in de menubalk "beeld" kies dan kan ik alleen 'werkbalken, vormgeving of mappen' selecteren. Dus kom ik niet verder.) Net als de klant in 2024 kan ik in de menubalk 'Beeld' niet kiezen voor sorteren conversaties. De handleiding geeft aan dat je 'afzonderlijke conversaties' kan aanvinken, maar dat zit helemaal niet in het menu.

Dan komt de moderator met een best bewerkelijke en vreemde oplossing: zet in thunderbird de menubalk aan, rechtermuisknop klikken in een leeg stuk van de balk en kies menubalk. Als u in het menu dat nu zichtbaar is voor beeld kiest ziet u meer opties.

En daar blijft het bij. Ik heb dit geprobeerd en ik zie allemaal opties die ik kan toevoegen aan mijn werkbalk... Ben er uren mee bezig al, wat een gedoe! Ik wil gewoon af van dat automatische samenvoegen van mijn berichten en daar een korte instrucite voor die klopt. Kan dit? hartelijke groet, Babet
creator: babetmchbruns
